trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs> classe é usada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> evento.

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Há apenas duas propriedades dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> propriedade permite que você excluir ou modificar itens de legenda personalizada e padrão e adicionar itens de legenda personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade também pode ser usada para alterar a ordem dos itens de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> propriedade é usada para identificar a legenda que gerou esse evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs" /> com a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> e o nome da legenda especificados.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Usado para remover, modificar ou alterar a ordem dos itens de legenda padrão e personalizadas no evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" />.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser usado para adicionar itens de legenda personalizados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> propriedade permite que você exclua ou modifique o padrão e itens de legenda personalizado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> evento e adicionar itens de legenda personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos itens de legenda também pode ser alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName> properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName> propriedades podem ser usadas para determinar o elemento de dados que está associado um item de legenda padrão.

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades retorna cadeias de caracteres de comprimento zero para itens de legenda personalizado, como itens personalizados não são associados aos dados do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você determine qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> o evento foi gerado, que permite que você personalize a um indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" />, que pode ser usado para determinar qual legenda foi o remetente do evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="string" /> valor que representa o nome do associado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> objeto.
